title: Weekly Digest (26 May, 2019 - 2 June, 2019)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 46 issues were created.
Of these, 16 issues have been closed and 30 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #8334 [[developerXP] remove unused deps](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8334), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #8333 [Update ko.json](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8333), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:green_heart: #8332 [Move translations to node_modules in release build](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8332), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #8331 [drop x86 and x86_64](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8331), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #8330 [update open-login-callback after fx/def macro fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8330), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:green_heart: #8329 [WIP: Make suggested gas 1 if less than 1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8329), by [kirkins](https://github.com/kirkins)
:green_heart: #8327 [WIP Scan invalid qr-code and dismiss error with no redirect](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8327), by [krisc](https://github.com/krisc)
:green_heart: #8326 [don't exclude arm64-v8a libraries](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8326), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #8325 [`Re-matches must match again a string` at attempt to report a bug when logged out](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8325), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #8321 [Change or remove back button from DApp browser screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8321), by [naghdy](https://github.com/naghdy)
:green_heart: #8318 [[Tests] Configure automation framework to cover Goerli network testing](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8318), by [asemiankevich](https://github.com/asemiankevich)
:green_heart: #8317 [ [Fixes #8066] Added native ENS registration](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8317), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:green_heart: #8314 [[keycard onboarding] backup recovery phrase screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8314), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:green_heart: #8313 [[keycard onboarding] 'screenshot taken' modal screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8313), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:green_heart: #8312 [[keycard onboarding] 'connection lost' modal screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8312), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:green_heart: #8311 [[keycard onboarding] turn on NFC screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8311), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:green_heart: #8310 [[keycard onboarding] pin screens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8310), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:green_heart: #8309 [[keycard onboarding] keycard tapped modal screens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8309), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:green_heart: #8308 [[keycard onboarding] puk and pair code screens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8308), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:green_heart: #8307 [[keycard onboarding] preparing, pairing and finishing screens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8307), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:green_heart: #8306 [[keycard onboarding] intro and start screens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8306), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:green_heart: #8304 [Feature/rework ttt](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8304), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #8302 [Stop exporting services (Android)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8302), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #8301 [Check for caching of sensitive information (Android)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8301), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #8300 [Check into validity checker (Android)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8300), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #8299 [Display DApp in fullscreen when user scrolls up](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8299), by [iurimatias](https://github.com/iurimatias)
:green_heart: #8295 [preview privacy mode not working properly in some android devices until app restart](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8295), by [bitsikka](https://github.com/bitsikka)
:green_heart: #8294 [Revert to TtT contract with on-chain tribute storage](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8294), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #8292 [ Google Play 64-bit requirement to solve before August 1, 2019 ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8292), by [annadanchenko](https://github.com/annadanchenko)
:green_heart: #8291 [How to hide 'Home' tab?](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8291), by [AlleniCode](https://github.com/AlleniCode)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #8328 [[fix] event transfer hash turned into a function](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8328), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8324 [[fix] destructuring in events for fx/defn macro](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8324), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8323 [E2E for sync public, group chats and profile details: username and photo](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8323), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #8322 [[feature] add transaction watch](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8322), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8320 [[feature] support for new CIDv1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8320), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8319 [[feature] allow internal transaction to specify asset](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8319), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8316 [bump version to 0.14.0](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8316), by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
:heart: #8315 [Remove unused chat fields](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8315), by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
:heart: #8305 [Add scroll on wallet](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8305), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #8303 [E2E for pairing devices](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8303), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #8298 [Update Play Store phone screenshots](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8298), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #8297 [Fix/on result in app transactions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8297), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8296 [[fix] superfluous keyword](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8296), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8293 [Update screenshoots in PlayStore ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8293), by [annadanchenko](https://github.com/annadanchenko)
:heart: #8290 [Enable asset in Wallet before usage](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8290), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #8289 [Fix custom tokens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8289), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #8321 [Change or remove back button from DApp browser screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8321), by [naghdy](https://github.com/naghdy)
It received :+1: x2, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x0.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #8304 [Feature/rework ttt](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8304), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
It received 14 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 37 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 15 pull requests were updated.

# COMMITS
Last week there were 22 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [Remove unused fields in chats dictionary.  Signed-off-by: Igor Mandrigin <i@mandrigin.ru>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/34300cc0c09405b28f1d7740da5054d70ff49b6c) by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[fix] event transfer hash turned into a function  that is silly  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/334b3c41a9818130e586776e7d2ed8f423cd2647) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [e2e for sync chats and profile  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9fe656705eb13349354b01b43455c29d8fe106d8) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fixes #6573  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/090a4e7c7684d362eb1e429877b74327acafcae9) by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[Android, iOS] Advanced ClojureScript compilation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/daacccb51275ca894e5f76b054297fde7ff1cd5e) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[fix] destructuring in events for fx/defn macro  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f03225c03d5ee144ddba8417df65d80afd9bd385) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[feature] add transaction watch  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/254639e586d8906c3fd6cc91a38d51a27d79242d) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[feature] add basic decoding support for swarm  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/4b6e5763e1c0220a4221664c8b980d3787bd5943) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[feature] allow internal transaction to specify asset  - allows transaction flow started by an internal feature to show the right asset in the overview and in transaction messages (required for tribute to talk)  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/131b423a0acb92618192be17a92a9e51feda592e) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add scroll on wallet  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/6a74c3a1ef4f0c43f91849720a0eab06a1825da1) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Update Play Store phone screenshots  Signed-off-by: Igor Mandrigin <i@mandrigin.ru>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c6a389b75b9d927c8355fe9b770fbfbf2b9fdb78) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [bump version to 0.14.0  Signed-off-by: Igor Mandrigin <i@mandrigin.ru>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/1c88237e44e13db0f6a1677e96873af717cbc1f0) by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Prepare to use status-go based protocol: 1-1 and public chat management APIs.  Connect to stubs of status-go protocol API, behind the flag. Since status-go isn't updated yet, setting this flag will break the app. What needs to be tested is no regressions in a normal mode.  Signed-off-by: Igor Mandrigin <i@mandrigin.ru>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/af6c784ab4b5f0c92c3a3e1ccc32e9dd82ffa645) by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[fix] on-result event for in app transactions  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/513ca85f27eacd1aa336e0603705aebfe5df594e) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add goerli testnet  Signed-off-by: Igor Mandrigin <i@mandrigin.ru>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8014f0583708b529f13493889476abd6d7bf9b11) by [dshulyak](https://github.com/dshulyak)
:hammer_and_wrench: [e2e pairing 1-1 and contacts  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/590ba7c874fa34c52177351cf022cfc8a537de2a) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [save keycard key-uid to account and use it to login  Signed-off-by: Dmitry Novotochinov <dmitry.novot@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/fd061833f52131cf714757e666da8221773d1836) by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[fix] superfluous keyword  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/7b8bf647e226384c57290d6d382c0654ef38e4a1) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Enable asset in Wallet before usage  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/092860f38adf7948f952229b05a2d90ca3c38569) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix custom tokens  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/5382cad5ec6c8ab66393a688041e0a9e29700569) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [RAM bundle basic setup](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c7c7b50281cad5d912e1ddb86771ed932918326a) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[dev feature] extend the defn macro  the defn macro knows register the function as an events under the keywords provided in the :events key of the attributes map. It also adds the interceptors provided in the :interceptors map  exemple:  ```clojure (fx/defn hello4   {:doc "this function is useless as well"    :events [:test/valid1 :test/valid2]}   [{:keys [db]} b]   {:db (assoc db :a b) :b (:a db)}) ```  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9b04dc6530746cda9bffef66d5df483a7c29a2c9) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
